abstract: In final numbers for Tuesday and Wednesday, which Nielsen released on a delay from its regular schedule, Fox finished No. 1 on both nights due largely to “American Idol.”
snippet: In final numbers for Tuesday and Wednesday, which Nielsen released on a delay from its regular schedule, Fox finished No. 1 on both nights due largely to “American Idol.”
lead_paragraph: In final numbers for Tuesday and Wednesday, which Nielsen released on a delay from its regular schedule, Fox finished No. 1 on both nights largely because of “American Idol,” which earned well over 23 million viewers on each night. On Tuesday, “Idol” delivered 23.4 million viewers, followed by “Fringe” at 9 p.m. (9.2 million), while on Wednesday, “Idol” garnered 23.6 million at 9 p.m. after an episode of “Lie to Me” at 8 p.m. drew 8.7 million viewers.
